tool_description: Beer brewing calculators and other utilities right at your fingertip!
name: Rustybeer
title: Rustybeer

api_list.name: abv
api_list.description: Calculates Alcohol By Volume from Original and Final Gravity values
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rustybeer.p.rapidapi.com/abv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rustybeer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: dilution
api_list.description: Calculates new gravity after wort dilution or boil off from original gravity, current wort volume and the target volume (targetVolume must be defined) AND/OR Calculates new volume for wanted target gravity from original gravity, current wort volume (targetGravity must be defined)
api_list.code:
